item.title: My First Swiggy Order
item.description: My first order through swiggy didn’t go as planned. I fell sick for a week after eating food that I ordered through swiggy. Please find a copy of my review on iOS app store down below.

item.title: Book review: Pandora's Lab
item.description: I placed an order for Pandora’s Lab after reading about it in Abhinav Agarwal’s blog titled “Best books I read in 2019 and 2018” 1. This was a quick read and I thoroughly enjoyed reading each chapter of the book.
